meanings.definition: A type of mushroom with long, thin stems and small caps.
meanings.sent1: The enokitake mushroom has long, thin stems.
meanings.sent2: I added enokitake to the stir-fry for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The enokitake mushroom tried to wear a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The enokitake mushroom stood tall like a forest of tiny trees.
meanings.sent5: In the forest, the enokitake mushroom stood out with its slender stems.

meanings.definition: To cook or use enokitake mushrooms in a dish.
meanings.sent1: I will enokitake the mushrooms before adding them to the soup.
meanings.sent2: She enokitakes the mushrooms by sautéing them lightly.
meanings.sent3: The chef enokitaked the mushrooms with a sprinkle of seasoning.
meanings.sent4: He enokitakes the mushrooms as if they were delicate treasures.
meanings.sent5: Enokitaking the mushrooms brings out their unique flavor in the dish.
